S06n633:3: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārthaṃ trayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ |
S06n633:4: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
S06n633:5: atha khalu bhagavān śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmya pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdatprajñapta evāsane paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhīṃ smṛtimupasthāpya |
S06n633:6: atha khalu saṃbahulā bhikṣavo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāman |
S06n633:7: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirabhivandya bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdan ||1 ||
S06n633:8: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhutistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ |
S06n633:9: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat- āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S06n633:11: yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa |
S06n633:12: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parīnditāḥ paramayā parīndanayā |
S06n633:13: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam ?
S06n633:14: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat- sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06n633:20: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06n633:21: bhāṣiṣye'haṃ te-yathā bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyaṃ yathā pratipattavyaṃ yathā cittaṃ pragrahītavyam |
S06n633:23: bhagavānasyaitadavocat-iha subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitenaiva cittamutpādayitavyam-yāvantaḥ subhūte sattvāḥ sattvadhātau sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītā aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñino vā,
S06n633:25: te ca mayā sarve'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ |
S06n633:26: evamaparimāṇānapi sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati |
S06n633:31: na sa subhūte bodhisattvo vaktavyo yasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta,
S06n633:33: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute na bodhisattvena vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam,
S06n633:37: evaṃ hi sūbhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet |
S06n633:40: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇāmudgrahītum |
S06n633:41: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum ?
S06n633:43: bhagavānāha- evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu adha ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu samantāddaśasu dikṣu sukaramākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum ?
S06n633:45: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti,
S06n633:46: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum |
S06n633:47: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet ||4 ||
S06n633:48: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ?
S06n633:52: yā sā bhagavan lakṣaṇasaṃpattathāgatena bhāṣitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat |
S06n633:53: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat yāvatsubhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanmṛṣā,
S06n633:54: yāvadalakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanna mṛṣeti hi lakṣaṇālakṣaṇatastathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ||5 ||
S06n633:56: kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne,
S06n633:58: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne guṇavantaḥ śīlavantaḥ prajñāvantaśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06n633:60: na khalu punaste subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n633:62: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitā anekabuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n633:63: ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu ekacittaprasādamapi pratilapsyante |
S06n633:67: sarve te subhūte aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti |
S06n633:69: na hi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmātmasaṃjñā pravartate,
S06n633:73: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartate |
S06n633:75: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartate |
S06n633:77: sacetsubhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
S06n633:84: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharma udgrahītavyo nādharmaḥ |
S06n633:85: tasmādiyaṃ tathāgatena saṃdhāya vāgbhāṣitā-kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyamājānadbhidharmā eva prahātavyāḥ prāgevādharmā iti ||6 ||
S06n633:86: punaraparaṃ bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06n633:89: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06n633:90: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirityabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06n633:98: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n633:99: api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt |
S06n633:101: bahu sugata sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt |
S06n633:106: bhagavānāha-yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n633:107: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo vistareṇa deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06n633:110: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06n633:113: buddhadharmā buddhadharmā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
S06n633:115: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati-mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
S06n633:121: na rūpamāpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān dharmānāpannaḥ |
S06n633:123: sacedbhagavan srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavet- mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti,
S06n633:126: bhagavānāha- takiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati-mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti ?
S06n633:128: sa sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati-mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti |
S06n633:130: na hi sa kaściddharmo yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvamāpannaḥ |
S06n633:132: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati-mayānāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti ?
S06n633:134: na anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati-mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti |
S06n633:136: na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo'nāgāmitvamāpannaḥ |
S06n633:138: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu arhata evaṃ bhavati-mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti ?
S06n633:142: na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo'rhannāma |
S06n633:144: sacedbhagavan arhata evaṃ bhavet-mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti,
S06n633:150: na ca me bhagavannevaṃ bhavati- arhannasmyahaṃ vītarāga iti |
S06n633:152: na māṃ tathāgato vyākariṣyadaraṇāvihāriṇāmagryaḥ subhūtiḥ kulaputro na kvacidviharati,
S06n633:154: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhata-samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ ?
S06n633:156: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ ||
S06n633:157: bhagavānāha-yaḥ kaścitsubhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet-ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
S06n633:160: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
S06n633:162: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam |
S06n633:164: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyo yattasyaivaṃ rūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ |
S06n633:165: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet ?
S06n633:169: ātmabhāva ātmabhāva iti bhagavan na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ |
S06n633:171: na hi bhagavan sa bhāvo nābhāvaḥ |
S06n633:173: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāstāvatya eva gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ ?
S06n633:176: subhūtirāha-tā eva tāvadbhagavan bahvayo gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ,
S06n633:180: yāvatyastāsu gaṅgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyustāvato lokadhātūn kaścideva strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnaparipurṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n633:181: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt ?
S06n633:183: bahu sugata strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam |
S06n633:184: bhagavānāha- yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā tāvato lokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n633:185: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06n633:187: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya bhāṣyeta vā saṃprakāśyeta vā,
S06n633:189: kaḥ punarvādo ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāptaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06n633:191: parameṇa te subhūte āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
S06n633:192: tasmiṃśca subhūte pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ ||12 ||
S06n633:193: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-ko nāma ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
S06n633:195: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat- prajñāpāramitā nāmāyaṃ subhūte dharmaparyāyaḥ |
S06n633:201: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ?
S06n633:204: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit,
S06n633:215: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho draṣṭavyaḥ ?
S06n633:219: yāni hi tāni bhagavan dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāni,
S06n633:222: bhagavānāha-yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā dine dine gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
S06n633:224: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhyaparebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06n633:232: na mayā bhagavan jātvevaṃrūpo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ |
S06n633:233: parameṇa te bhagavan āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n633:234: ye iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti |
S06n633:239: na mama bhagavan āścaryaṃ yadahamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavakalpayāmi adhimucye |
S06n633:240: ye'pi te bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
S06n633:241: ye imaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06n633:244: api tu khalu punarbhagavan na teṣāmātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
S06n633:245: na sattvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
S06n633:256: ye iha subhūte sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante |
S06n633:259: yāṃ ca subhūte tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate,
S06n633:262: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā,
S06n633:266: nāsīnme tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā sattvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā,
S06n633:267: nāpi me kācitsaṃjñā vā asaṃjñā vā babhūva |
S06n633:269: sacenme subhūte tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā abhaviṣyat,
S06n633:274: abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte atīte'dhvani pañca jātiśatāni yadahaṃ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūvam |
S06n633:279: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitavyam |
S06n633:287: tasmādeva tathāgato bhāṣate-apratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam |
S06n633:289: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena evaṃrūpo dānaparityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya |
S06n633:293: ya evaṃ te sarvasattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāsta eva asattvāḥ |
S06n633:298: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yastathāgatena dharmo'bhisaṃbuddho deśito nidhyātaḥ,
S06n633:300: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo'ndhakārapraviṣṭo na kiṃcidapi paśyet,
S06n633:301: evaṃ vastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati |
S06n633:302: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rātrau sūrye'bhyudgate nānavidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet,
S06n633:303: evamavastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo'vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati ||
S06n633:304: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06n633:309: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti ||14 ||
S06n633:310: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā purvāhṇakālasamaye gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
S06n633:318: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo'tulyo'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ |
S06n633:319: ayaṃ ca subhūte dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣito'grayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya,
S06n633:321: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06n633:326: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyeṇa puṇyaskandhenāṃ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
S06n633:328: sarve te subhūte sattvāḥ samāṃśena bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyanti vacayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti |
S06n633:330: na hi śakyaṃ subhūte ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hīnādhimuktiakaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrotum,
S06n633:332: nābodhisattvapratijñai sattvaiḥ śakyamayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotuṃ vā udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā |
S06n633:334: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yatra pṛthivīpradeśe idaṃ sūtraṃ prakaśayiṣyate,
S06n633:335: pūjanīyaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya |
S06n633:338: api tu ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06n633:344: yāni ca teṣāṃ subhūte sattvānāṃ paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṛtānyapāyasaṃvartanīyāni,
S06n633:345: dṛṣṭa eva dharme paribhūtatayā tāni paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṣapayiṣyanti,
S06n633:347: abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte atīte'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairdīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pareṇa paratareṇa caturaśītibuddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan ye mayārāgitāḥ,
S06n633:349: yacca mayā subhūte te buddhā bhagavanta ārāgitāḥ,
S06n633:351: yacca paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06n633:353: asya khalu punaḥ subhūte puṇyaskandhasyāntikādasau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06n633:354: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭimamipi koṭiśatatamīmapi koṭiśatasahasratamīmapi koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi |
S06n633:355: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniṣadamapi yāvadaupamyamapi na kṣamate ||
S06n633:356: sacetpunaḥ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā ahaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ bhāṣeyam,
S06n633:357: yāvatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasmin samaye puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti,
S06n633:360: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo'tulyo'yaṃ dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ |
S06n633:362: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyam,
S06n633:365: bhagavānāha-iha subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-sarve sattvā mayā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ |
S06n633:366: evaṃ sa sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati |
S06n633:373: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthito nāma ||
S06n633:374: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ ?
S06n633:375: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat- yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06n633:376: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
S06n633:378: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
S06n633:380: na māṃ dīpaṃkarastathāgato vyākariṣyat-bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti |
S06n633:381: yasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06n633:382: tasmādahaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatena vyākṛta- bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha |
S06n633:390: yaḥ kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet-tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti,
S06n633:394: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
S06n633:395: yaśca subhūte tathāgatena dharmo'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā tatra na satyaṃ na mṛṣā |
S06n633:400: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyaḥ ?
S06n633:401: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha- yo'sau bhagavaṃstathāgatena puruṣo bhāṣita upetakāyo mahākāya iti,
S06n633:405: yo bodhisattva evaṃ vadet-ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmiti,
S06n633:408: asti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo nāma ?
S06n633:410: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo nāma |
S06n633:411: bhagavānāha- sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte asattvāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ,
S06n633:413: tasmāttathāgato bhāṣate-nirātmānaḥ sarvadharmā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpudgalāḥ sarvadharmā iti ||
S06n633:414: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet- ahaṃ kṣetravyūhānniṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
S06n633:417: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
S06n633:419: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo nirātmāno dharmā nirātmāno dharmā ityadhimucyate,
S06n633:424: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya divyaṃ cakṣuḥ ?
S06n633:427: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ ?
S06n633:430: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya dharmacakṣuḥ ?
S06n633:433: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya buddhacakṣuḥ ?
S06n633:436: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
S06n633:441: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
S06n633:452: cittadhārā cittadhāreti subhūte adhāraiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
S06n633:458: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n633:459: api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt ?
S06n633:463: bahu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam |
S06n633:465: puṇyaskandhaḥ puṇyaskandha iti subhūte askandhaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ |
S06n633:469: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ?
S06n633:473: rūpakāyapariniṣpattī rūpakāyapariniṣpattiriti bhagavan apariniṣpattireṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā |
S06n633:475: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ?
S06n633:482: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati-mayā dharmo deśita iti ?
S06n633:483: subhūtirāha-no hīdaṃ bhagavan tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati-mayā dharmo deśita iti |
S06n633:484: bhagavānāha-yaḥ subhūte evaṃ vadet- tathāgatena dharmo deśita iti,
S06n633:488: dharmadeśanā dharmadeśaneti subhūte nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo dharmadeśanā nāmopalabhyate ||
S06n633:489: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-asti bhagavan kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
S06n633:491: bhagavānāha- na te subhūte sattvā nāsattvāḥ |
S06n633:493: sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte sarve te subhūte asattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
S06n633:495: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu asti sa kaściddharmaḥ,
S06n633:498: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
S06n633:500: aṇurapi tatra dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate |
S06n633:502: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte samaḥ sa dharmo na tatra kaścidviṣamaḥ |
S06n633:504: nirātmatvena niḥsattvatvena nirjīvatvena niṣpudgalatvena samā sā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaiḥ kuśalairdharmairabhisaṃbudhyate |
S06n633:506: kuśalā dharmāḥ kuśalā dharmā iti subhūte adharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
S06n633:508: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhute strī vā puruṣo vā yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumeravaḥ parvatarājānaḥ,
S06n633:509: tāvato rāśīn saptānāṃ ratnānāmabhisaṃhṛtya tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n633:510: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet,
S06n633:511: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06n633:513: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati-mayā sattvāḥ parimocitā iti?
S06n633:514: na khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam |
S06n633:517: yadi punaḥ subhūte kaścitsattvo'bhaviṣyadyastathāgatena parimocitaḥ syāt,
S06n633:520: ātmagrāha iti subhūte agrāha eṣa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ |
S06n633:522: bālapṛthagjanā iti subhūte ajanā eva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
S06n633:538: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata-
S06n633:539: ye māṃ rūpeṇa cādrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa cānvaguḥ |
S06n633:540: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ ||1 ||
S06n633:541: dharmato buddho draṣṭavyo dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ |
S06n633:542: dharmatā ca na vijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum ||2 ||26 ||
S06n633:543: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā?
S06n633:544: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam |
S06n633:546: na hi subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā syāt |
S06n633:547: na khalu punaste subhūte kaścidevaṃ vadet-bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñaptaḥ ucchedo veti |
S06n633:548: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam |
S06n633:550: na bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñapto nocchedaḥ ||27 ||
S06n633:551: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n633:552: yaśca bodhisattvo nirātmakeṣvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
S06n633:554: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ |
S06n633:555: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha- nanu bhagavan bodhisattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ ?
S06n633:558: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścidevaṃ vadet-tathāgato gacchati vā āgacchati vā tiṣṭhati vā niṣīdati vā,
S06n633:563: tathāgata iti subhūte ucyate na kvacidgato na kutaścidāgataḥ |
S06n633:565: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanti trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajāṃsi,
S06n633:566: tāvatāṃ lokadhātūnāmevaṃrūpaṃ maṣiṃ kuryāt yāvadevamasaṃkhyeyena vīryeṇa tadyathāpi nāma paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ,
S06n633:567: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusaṃcayo bhavet ?
S06n633:591: yo hi kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet-ātmadṛṣṭistathāgatena bhāṣitā,
S06n633:593: api nu sa subhūte samyagvadamāno vadet ?
S06n633:601: bhagavānāha-evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sarvadharmā jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ |
S06n633:605: dharmasaṃjñā dharmasaṃjñeti subhūte asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā |
S06n633:607: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'prameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n633:608: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya dhārayeddeśayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt,
S06n633:614: svapnaṃ ca vidyudabhraṃ ca evaṃ draṣṭavya saṃskṛtam ||
S06n633:618: sthavirasubhūtiste ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti ||32 ||
